      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the ID of the driver. The ID may only contain ASCII letters, digits, hyphens and underscores. By convention the ID should be meaningful and all lower case letters (e.g. "mbus", "modbus").
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the driver.
